statements: DELETE FROM security_incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';

DELETE FROM iot_devices WHERE device_type = 'camera' AND location = 'Office';
DELETE FROM incident_reports WHERE severity_level > 5 AND incident_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM iot_devices WHERE device_type = 'sensor' AND device_name = 'Temperature Sensor'
